content: Sept 14 Major trucking and logistics firms like XPO Logistics Inc  Daseke Inc and United Parcel Service Inc said capacity will shrink due to a rush of construction and repair shipments to big-box retailers and households across the storm-crippled U.S. Southeast  as analysts warned of higher shipping prices.
